desapalanayedi ethakota munnahelage thathwaya kohomeyi?mahinda mama eka hithin eka payin widhayaka janadhipathikamata paksayi.ethakota yuanpiya?rupiyal hata dedas pansiyak ottuyi unnahelath ee sistam ekata manapayi.balaya nathi kale widhayaka janadhipathikama hoda naha kiyala gnyan gnyun noganne kawuda?mahinda mama wipaksa nayaka kale oya gnyan gnyun gama yuanpiyatath wada saddeta kola newa.yuanpiyath rajya madhya ula kawa.mahinda mamath eeka koranawa.yuanpiya somapalalawa maruwa.mahinda mamage aanduwa rosen chanukawa maruwa.jeaar premadasa wipaksayata oluwa ussanna dunne naha.mahinda mama - no diparans at ool jentlman and wumen.

thawada kolambaa awata kalapaye galu muwadora, janadhipathi mawatha, wokshol widiya, dikmans para, nidahas mawatha, jawaththa, torintan mawatha, hotan pedesa, rosmid pedesa, boralla, kota para, bans pedesa, wod pedesa, tawunhol, dam widiya, sugathadasa kridanganaya, grandpas saha premadasa kridanganaya awata heta pe.wa. 8.30 sita 10.45 dakwa widuliya wisandhi kere. pe.wa. 10.45 sita 1.00 dakwa kalaye empayar siti, bambalapitiya mahal niwasa, hawlok para, kirulapana, mayura pedesa, gothami para, aananda rajakaruna mawatha, maligawaththa, sangharaja mawatha, chethawana para, shantha jon widiya, ketawalamulla, masenjar widiya saha ee awata pradeshawala widuliya wisandhi kere. pa.wa. 1.00 sita pa.wa. 3.15 athara kalaye kolambaa awata yok widiya, palawana ha dewana haras widiya, chatham widiya, sar baron jayathilaka mawatha, galu muwadora kotasak, yuniyan pedesa, dharmapala mawatha, libarti plasa, kollupitiya welenda sankirnaya, bambalapitiya, alwitigala mawatha, aananda kumaraswami mawatha, punchiboralla, dematagoda, beslayin para, bodhiraja mawatha, sirimawo bandaranayaka mawatha, teknikal handiya, waraya awata widuliya wisandhi kere.
